title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 16 September 2013 - XWiki
content:
<fm2> has quit  
00:07 <vmassol> has quit  
00:36 <cjd\_> has joined #xwiki  
00:37 <cjd> has quit  
00:37 <Denis1> has quit  
00:45 <cjd\_> is now known as <cjd>  
02:24 <UCC> has quit  
04:30 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
05:51 <Denis> has quit  
07:29 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:16 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:27 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
08:28 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
08:34 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
08:34 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:40 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
08:41 <abusenius> has quit  
08:56 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
09:01 <vmassol> good morning  
09:06 <msmeria> has quit  
09:07 <ekarlso-> has quit  
09:11 <mflorea> vmassol: good morning. I'd like to upgrade myxwiki,org to 5.1 today. Do you remember what changes you made on xwiki.org to fix the memory issue after the 5.1 upgrade? I don  
09:11 <mflorea> I don't see it documented on http://main.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/UpgradesLog  
09:11 <vmassol> hmm let me check xwiki.org WEB-INF/lib dir  
09:11 <vmassol> I think I upgraded one jar  
09:11 <vmassol> but not sure  
09:12 <mflorea> I think it was related to code macro, the lib used for syntax coloring  
09:12 <vmassol> yes it was related to jython  
09:12 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:13 <vmassol> ok  
09:13 <vmassol> I see xwiki-platform-rendering-macro-code-5.2-SNAPSHOT.jar  
09:13 <vmassol> so you need to put a newer code macro jar  
09:13 <mflorea> I'll try with 5.2M2  
09:13 <vmassol> yes should be fine  
09:13 <vmassol> adding doc for xwiki.org  
09:13 <mflorea> thanks  
09:15 <sburjan> vmassol: good morning  
09:16 <vmassol> mflorea: wait  
09:16 <mflorea> ?  
09:16 <vmassol> you should upgrade myxwiki.org to 5.2M2  
09:16 <sburjan> vmassol: I am starting to test the migrations you told me in the mail on devlist. From which version should I migrate to 5.2 ?  
09:16 <vmassol> it's our test platform  
09:17 <vmassol> hmmm  
09:17 <mflorea> there's no XEM 5.2M2 so I'm not sure how the upgrade will go..  
09:17 <vmassol> I think  
09:17 <mflorea> I'd like to wait for the QA team to do to migration tests  
09:18 <vmassol> guillaume is supposed to commit a small jar for that  
09:18 <vmassol> maybe it's worth giving him 1 or 2 days and then install 5.2-SNAPSHOT with this jar on myxwiki.org  
09:18 <mflorea> yes, I don't think he made it for 5.2M2  
09:18 <vmassol> right now there's no advantage to installing 5.1 there  
09:18 <vmassol> it's not in 5.2M2 for sure  
09:19 <vmassol> if you install 5.1 now then we would need to install 5.2SNAP in a few days which is a pity IMO  
09:19 <vmassol> and if we don't do it then we loose an opportunity  
09:19 <vmassol> wdyt  
09:19 <vmassol> ?  
09:19 <vmassol> we could wait RC1 if you feel safer  
09:19 <vmassol> RC1 is only 1 week away  
09:19 <tmortagne> we don't really need XEM to upgrade myxwiki.org  
09:20 <tmortagne> what used to be in XEM war is no all in XE war anyway  
09:20 <tmortagne> s/no/now/  
09:20 <vmassol> yes and there should be no workspace in subwikis on myxwiki.org  
09:20 <mflorea> tmortagne: yes, but we still need to upgrade the XE xar which has changed and the users have to upgrade their wikis  
09:21 <vmassol> but we haven't tested much the migrations so it might still be good ot have sorin/manuel test some migrations first  
09:21 <mflorea> I don't think we should upgrade myxwiki.org before we do some local upgrade tests  
09:21 <vmassol> +1 to wait for at least 2 more days till sorin/manuel have made some migration tests  
09:21 <mflorea> if we can do this tests before RC1 then I'm fine with waiting for RC1, I'll do the upgrade  
09:22 <vmassol> sburjan:  
09:22 <tmortagne> the only thing wrong in M2 in theory is the <xwiki.extension.distribution.wikiui> which is org.xwiki.enterprise:xwiki-enterprise-ui-wiki and should be org.xwiki.enterprise:xwiki-enterprise-ui-common IMO  
09:22 <vmassol> sburjan is starting today the tests  
09:22 <tmortagne> for myxwiki.org  
09:22 <sburjan> vmassol: again, from which version should I test ?  
09:22 <vmassol> sburjan: I'd say from 4.5.x  
09:22 <sburjan> okay, thanks  
09:22 <tmortagne> for a mix a workspace and standard wikis farm we need Guillaume changes  
09:22 <sburjan> I'll report here is something is not properly working  
09:23 <vmassol> ok thanks sburjan  
09:23 <mflorea> in the mean time I'll modify global.vm on myxwiki.org to add the menu UIX because the user that pinged me a few times for the upgrade wants to use the Menu App.  
09:23 <sburjan> but again, I can't guarantee that you won't run into trouble with upgrading myxwiki.org  
09:24 <vmassol> don't worry we'll blame it on you anyway if it fails :)  
09:24 <mflorea> :)  
09:24 <vmassol> (kidding)  
09:25 <sburjan> vmassol: I know you will :))  
09:25 <sburjan> so I'm gonna start with a 4.5.3 XEM WAR to a 5.2M2 XE WAR  
09:25 <sburjan> let's see how it goes  
09:26 <vmassol> ok  
09:30 <polx> has quit  
09:37 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:53 <sburjan> vmassol: should I use the option to upgrade all wikis ?  
09:54 <vmassol> sburjan: I think so  
10:01 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:10 <sburjan> guys, does anybody have any idea where can I modify a workspaces description from the UI ? I'm on 5.2M2  
10:10 <sburjan> seems that wiki directory does not have an edit button in the livetable  
10:15 <fm2> has joined #xwiki  
10:15 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: any idea?  
10:17 <sburjan> vmassol: seems I have it from the Wiki Manager, but that is the old app afaik  
10:17 <vmassol> yes you can edit the descriptor ofc  
10:17 <vmassol> (XWikiServer\*)  
10:17 <gdelhumeau> Yes, it is on the Wiki Manager, but you had to install it  
10:17 <vmassol> but I thought maybe there was a workspaces feature to do that  
10:17 <vmassol> ok so no specific workspaces feature?  
10:18 <sburjan> gdelhumeau: I only had wiki manager, because I was migrating from a Manager  
10:18 <gdelhumeau> I don't think so  
10:18 <sburjan> \*only = already  
10:18 <gdelhumeau> ok  
10:19 <sburjan> only one bug so far :)  
10:23 <sburjan> it seems that after the migration, Lucene is STILL the selected search engine. It means that there is nothing overwritten by 5.1 so that SOLR to become the default. Is this normal ?  
10:26 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:26 <vmassol> sburjan: yes it's normal  
10:27 <vmassol> now is it good? that's another question ;)  
10:27 <vmassol> basically the choice is definedin a page SearchConfig  
10:27 <vmassol> that we don't provide  
10:27 <vmassol> (it's created when you use your wiki)  
10:27 <vmassol> so there's no upgrade of it  
10:27 <vmassol> the good part is that we don't magically change the config for the user  
10:27 <vmassol> the bad part is that the user may not be aware that there's a better search engine  
10:27 <sburjan> yes  
11:39 <sburjan> gdelhumeau: how is the workspace template extension called in 5.2 ?  
11:41 <sburjan> after the migration I see something like: XWiki Platform - Workspace - Template Features 5.1 .. and the install button  
11:41 <sburjan> I am trying to understand if the template is 5.2M2 or it's 5.1. Footer says 5.2M2, but dunno if it's correct  
11:47 <gdelhumeau> I didn't change its name  
11:48 <gdelhumeau> I am currently watching why the DW is launched just after the creation of a wiki  
12:09 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
12:11 <fm2> has quit  
12:11 <sburjan> gdelhumeau: that must be a bug  
12:12 <gdelhumeau> it seems  
12:12 <sburjan> gdelhumeau: I have found some bugs on the homepage, but I think it's because the merging does not properly work  
12:12 <sburjan> merging done by the dw  
12:12 <gdelhumeau> sburjan: I have also reported http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-9456  
12:14 <sburjan> gdelhumeau: this only reproduces on a clean instance. I don;t get the DW on a migrated wiki server  
12:42 <tmortagne> has quit  
12:56 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
12:59 <UCC> has joined #xwiki  
13:11 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
13:12 <evalica> has quit  
13:29 <polx> has quit  
13:46 <mflorea> has quit  
13:48 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: I'm trying to apply https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/pull/166  
13:48 <vmassol> but the commit message doesn't correspond to the commit :)  
14:03 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
14:05 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
14:09 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: sorry, it's fixed  
14:10 <vmassol> ok checking  
14:39 <gdelhumeau> do we stop that: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/BuildManagerRoster ?  
14:42 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
14:44 <sburjan> gdelhumeau: I think that during migration, the workspaces template is not properly migrated, and all the workspaces you create in 5.2M2 after a migration are actually 5.1  
14:45 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: no, http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/BuildManagerRoster is still used and valid  
14:45 <vmassol> ah no  
14:45 <vmassol> wait  
14:45 <vmassol> this is the BM  
14:45 <vmassol> not the RM  
14:45 <vmassol> indeed the BM has been stopped  
14:45 <gdelhumeau> sburjan: I think it's related to XWIKI-9457  
15:16 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: that said, I think we're not far from needing some BM… we've been having failing builds for a long time and full success is no longer  the norm...
